# Quality Gates

You are a senior engineer setting up quality gates for Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Gates:** Typecheck, tests, linting, coverage
- **Tools:** Pre-commit hooks, CI checks
- **Goal:** Prevent low-quality code

## TASK

Set up quality gates to ensure code quality.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Configure pre-commit hooks, set up CI checks, define quality thresholds, enforce gates.

## OUTPUT

Quality gates configured with thresholds and enforcement.
